workflow.page.title: Workflows
workflow.page.subtitle: Workflows are collections of nodes that automate a process. Workflows begin execution when a trigger condition occurs and execute sequentially to achieve complex tasks.
workflow.nodata.title: No workflows
workflow.nodata.description: It looks like you don't have any workflows. Get started by adding one.
workflow.action.duplicate.modal.title: Duplicate "{{name}}"
workflow.action.duplicate.modal.content: Are you sure to duplicate this workflow?
workflow.action.delete.modal.title: Delete "{{name}}"
workflow.action.delete.modal.content:
Are you sure want to delete this workflow?
This action cannot be undone.
workflow.action.batch_delete.modal.title: Delete workflows
workflow.action.batch_delete.modal.conte:
Are you sure want to delete these {{count}} selected workflows?
This action cannot be undone.
workflow.action.enable.errmsg.unpublishe: Please complete the orchestration and publish the changes first
workflow.action.execute.modal.title: Execute workflow
workflow.action.execute.modal.content: You have unpublished changes. Do you really want to execute this workflow based on the last published version?
workflow.action.execute.prompt: Running... Please check the history later
workflow.props.name: Name
workflow.new.title: Create Workflow
workflow.new.subtitle: Using a workflow to monitor, apply, deploy and notify.
workflow.new.templates.title: Choose a Template
workflow.new.templates.subtitle: Use these template workflows to quickly initialize your automated certificate management workflow.
workflow.new.templates.template.standard: A standard operating procedure that includes application, deployment, and notification steps.
workflow.new.templates.template.certtest: A monitoring operating procedure that includes monitoring, and notification steps.
workflow.detail.design.action.publish.mo: Are you sure to publish your changes?
workflow.detail.design.action.rollback.m: Are you sure to rollback your changes to the last published version?
workflow.detail.design.action.import.for: The first node must be a start node
The last node must be an end node
The start node must be unique
workflow.detail.design.uncompleted_desig: The orchestration is not ready. Please check if there are any nodes not configured.
workflow.detail.design.unpublished_draft: The orchestration is not released yet.
workflow.detail.design.unsaved_changes.c: You have unsaved changes. Do you really want to close the panel and drop those changes?
